<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MI is a load-register-on-condition pseudo instruction.  Replace it with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LowOpcode if source and destination are both low GR32s and HighOpcode if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// source and destination are both high GR32s. Otherwise, a branch sequence</span></CodeLine>
